title: "Using a standard RGB camera and AI to obtain vegetation data"
excerpt: "But a new study from the University of Illinois and Mississippi State University (MSU) shows that pictures from a standard red-green-blue (RGB) camera combined with AI deep learning can provide equivalent crop prediction tools for a fraction of the cost."
